description: This script initializes a database for the Robot Framework Test Manager application by creating tables, default roles, and a system user with disabled authentication.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents a user in the system.

classes.name: Role
classes.description: Represents a role that can be assigned to users.

classes.name: UserRoleEnum
classes.description: Enumeration of possible user roles, including ADMIN.

methods.name: create_admin_user()
methods.description: Creates a default system user named 'system' with admin role if it doesn't already exist.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main function to initialize database, create default data, and set up the environment.
